reviews.review:
Este juego es entretenido, divertido, y tiene sus mecánicas donde hay que enfocarse.
Tiene una historia la cual da un final satisfactorio y comletador.
Es un "Juego de Culto".
Y esa es la definicion mas adecuada.
singleplayer was enjoyable and the multiplayer is a blast everytime i replay it with friends, there isn't too much to say other then this games fun if you love puzzles.

Now that I've beaten it, all I can say is: Amazing. One of the best games ever. It's so good, there doesn't need to be a Portal 3. I would like a Portal 3, but it I don't think it would ever surpass Portal 2. 

Gameplay is superb, story is stellar, music is a jam! GLaDOS and Wheatley are unforgettable, the Puzzles were mind boggling but never unfair. It's also only 10 bones (1-5 bucks on a sale) and a potato can run it, so no reason not to play it.
Очень крутая игра, стоит своих денег
You get to see more of valve man's head than in tf2... and the games good I guess
отличная игра, прошел с другом полностью, жалко что короткая, советую всем.
Game is so intense, even has dope music! I would definitely recommend this game!

Très bon jeu qui m'a détruit des neuronnes car j'ai trop réfléchi sur ces énigmes extraordinaires.
Je le recomende a tous et c'est un jeu très beau et avec un gameplay de ouf.
Juste , votre cerveau va se retourner 91 fois avec ce jeux ;)

played it through multiple times and I still don't get tired of it. the lore behind it is impressive too and thinking with portals is fantastic. the steam community with their maps is also extra content so check them out too. especially Portal Stories: Mel and Portal Reloaded. see them as DLCs
Co-op is also big fun with a friend and more with community maps

개발자가 난이도 조절을 아주 잘함. 다른 게임들은 퍼즐에 막혀서 지칠때가 있는데 포탈2는 그런게 덜하고 지루하지 않음. 
오더 시스템이 잘 되어 있어서 답답함이 줄어드는 것도 덤

Perfect second installment of the Portal series. It adds so many new game mechanics and lore, and balances it perfectly with the first game. It's great because it doesn't feel like it was made just for money. 
It's really amazing to see "behind" the test chambers and such, and the huge areas are just amazing to look at. It really gives an interesting picture behind the past of Aperture Science. It was so entertaining to complete the gel tests, with the pre-recordings of the CEO playing in the background. 
I also think the difficulty of the puzzles were great.
i love the game, every time i hear some portal music I fell hapy becouse its so good and i want Portal 3 NOW

9.3/10
Is this a masterpiece or what? First of all, go play the original if you haven’t yet.
Portal 2 is like the complete game after Portal being the beta version. So much more stuff is here. You have gels, you have the crazy bot lady, you have a new British bot guy, you learn about the history behind this crazy lab, you get an ending which you wouldn’t see coming in anyway. Jokes? Still there, even funnier. Launching yourself by jumping into portals? There’s more of that. It’s amazing how a story can be so stupid and serious in the same time. Puzzles are so innovative. I was so annoyed by seeing some similar puzzles in games over and over again but in Portal 2 there’s none of that shit. Portal has a unique style in puzzles which it commits to till the end of the game.
Now co-op is a whole other story. You can buy this game just for the co-op and not even play the single player. Remember that Portal style which gives you so much freedom to experiment every possible way? Well imagine doing that with a friend. You can get as stupid as you want and the game just does whatever you want. Every stage is a showcase of how creative the designers are and how they invite you to use your creativity as well.
I had a blast playing Portal 2 and definitely gonna go through it again soon. This is a must play for every gamer.

This game is a must-play. So is the first one. Why? Because it gives you something no one game is going to give you. If you find yourself scrolling through your library and the store, endlessly looking for the next game to captivate you, scroll no further. You will laugh. You will be challenged with critical thinking. You will have a damn good time. 

And then it will end, and you will be right back where you were: Looking for the next game to give you the dopamine hits you crave. But what you won't do? Regret playing this gem. 

$10, full send

this, along with the first portal game, are just
one of my most bestest favorite action puzzle games
that i have ever played, in my entire life! ^ ^

Finished this on PS3 and its great.
Лучший чёрный юмор от гладос есть, co op режим с сюжетом есть,злой смех от уитли есть, да что ешё нужно для счастья!

Оцінка 10/10
